name.ja: <ruby>再世の魔神<rt>リジェネシス・デーモン</rt></ruby> ベミドバル

text.en: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by revealing 1 monster in your hand with 2500 ATK or DEF. You can only Special Summon "Regenesis Archfiend Bemidbar" once per turn this way. You can only use each of the following effects of "Regenesis Archfiend Bemidbar" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Regenesis" card from your Deck or banishment to your hand, except "Regenesis Archfiend Bemidbar". During your opponent's End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can add it to your hand.
